name: Prospector (MichaelMXY)
description:
___What are the controls to your game? How do we play?___

click the cards and follow the prospector rules. 

  ___What creative additions did you make? How can we find them?___

1. New background created by myself

2. Changed the color for some texts, such as "Game Over", "your highest score is xxx".

3. original music created by myself in Garageband.

4. original sound effects created by myself in Garageband.

I. click card sound effect

II. Game over sound effect

III. Win the game (Round over) sound effect

IV. sound effect of the score (when the score adds to the scoreboard, the sound will play)

  ___Any assets used that you didn't create yourself? (art, music, etc. Just tell us where you got it, link it here)___

  ___Did you receive help from anyone outside this class? (list their names and what they helped with)___

  ___Did you get help from any online websites, videos, or tutorials? (link them here)___
